events.text: [color=#ffed29]("I know it's not good to change horses midstream, but these horses are MMA certified, and we hope to help you make the safest and most efficacious product possible.")
[color=#ffed29](I can already tell who wrote this letter, [i]haha.[/i])
[color=#ffed29](Good to know Mr. Throck is consistent with his talking and his writing!)
[color=#ffed29](...that must mean he even thinks in terms of horses.)
[color=#ffed29]("We're excited to be the new apothecaries reviewing [b]Remedium[/b]...and we hope to help you make the safest and most efficacious product possible.")
[color=#ffed29](So, this means apothecaries that have been rejecting us started 8 months ago.)
[color=#ffed29](Does that mean we've been rejected three times, and all these happened within less than a year???)
